metadata.title: CVE-2023-6502 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial of Service (DoS) condition has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions before 16.10.6, version 16.11 before 16.11.3, and17.0 before 17.0.1. It is possible for an attacker to cause a denial ofservice using a crafted wiki page.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
